#include "stdio.h"
#include "iostream"
#include "string"
#include "math.h"
#include "vector"
#include "algorithm"
#include "set"
#include "utility"
#include "queue"
  
using namespace std; 
  
  
# define n 10000001
bool a[n]={0};
int dp[n];
long long multi(long long a,long long b,long long c)
{
    long long x=0,y=a%c;
    while(b>0)
	{
        if(b%2==1)
		x=(x+y)%c;
        y=(y*2)%c;
        b=b/2;
    }
    return x%c;
}
 
 int expon(long long int a,long long int b,long long int c)
{
 long long x=1,y=a;
 while(b>0)
 {
 	if(b%2==1)
 	x=multi(x,y,c);
 	y=multi(y,y,c);
 	b=b/2;
 }
 return x%c;
}
int main()
{
 	int t; long long r,m; 
 for(long long i=4;i<n;i=i+2)
 	a[i]=1;
 for(long long i=3;i<sqrt(n);i=i+2)
 {
 	if(a[i]==0)
 	for(long long j=i*i;j<n;j+=2*i)
 	a[j]=1;
 }
 dp[1]=0;
 for(long long i=2;i<=n;i++)
 {
 	if(a[i]==0)
 	dp[i]=dp[i-1]+1;
 	else dp[i]=dp[i-1];
}
 while((scanf("%lld",&r))!=EOF)
 { 
 	if(r==1)
 	printf("0\n");
 	else
 	{
 	int ans=expon(2,dp[r]-1,10007);
  cout<<ans<<endl;
  }
 }
 return 0;
}
